snippet: The Giants will hold their 2013 training camp in East Rutherford, N.J., instead of returning to the University at Albany for the 17th time in the last 18 years.
abstract: The Giants will hold their 2013 training camp in East Rutherford, N.J., instead of returning to the University at Albany for the 17th time in the last 18 years.

headline.main: Giants to Skip Albany and Train in the Meadowlands
